\documentclass[7pt]{article}
\usepackage[newdimens]{labels}
\usepackage{PTSansNarrow} 
\renewcommand*\familydefault{\sfdefault} %% Only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\LabelCols=10
\LabelRows=49
\LeftPageMargin=11mm
\RightPageMargin=13mm
\TopPageMargin=2mm
\BottomPageMargin=12mm
\InterLabelColumn=0mm
\InterLabelRow=0mm
\LeftLabelBorder=0mm
\TopLabelBorder=0mm
\BottomLabelBorder=0mm
\RightLabelBorder=0mm
%\LabelInfoTrue
\LabelGridtrue
\setlength\tabcolsep{0.1mm}
\renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1}
\begin{document}
\begin{labels}
 %{ for label in stage.labels %}
 \parbox{1.7cm}{\centering \tiny %{{label.ident%}} \textbf{%{{label.sno%}}} }
 %{ endfor %}
\end{labels}
\end{document}
